description:
Client application for Squeezebox players on the Lyrion music server Squeeze Client is an Android client/controller application for the Lyrion music server (formerly known as Logitech media server or Squeezebox server) with Material Design 3 UI. Features
  • Music library browser
  • Music library search quick access
  • Playback and volume control
  • Playlist management
  • Multi-player management
  • Music download
  • Support for Light and dark theme as well as following system theme
  • Full integration with system media controls
